CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISPICKVAL(Contract_Term__c, "" )), ((MRC__c + Rental_or_Lease__c) * CASE( Contract_Term__c, "*6 Month", 6, "*18 Month", 18, "1 Year",12, "2 Years",24, "3 Years",36, "4 Years",48, "5 Years",60, "6 Years",72, 0 )), Rental_or_Lease__c)
CustomField.label: MRC by Contract Term
